CustomField.description: Total Risk Score for the Agreement
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISNULL(Apttus__Risk_Rating__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__RiskRatingIconPath__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus__RiskRatingLevel__c )), IMAGE(Apttus__RiskRatingIconPath__c, "") + ' ' + TEXT(Apttus__Risk_Rating__c ) +' (' + Apttus__RiskRatingLevel__c + ')' , '')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total Risk Score for the Agreement
CustomField.label: Total Risk Score
